TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListControlDataBindingHandler extends System.Web.UI.Design.DataBindingHandler

Docs.summary: 在可视化设计器中执行 Web 服务器控件的数据绑定。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>控件的设计时数据绑定。 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler> <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>类通过使用<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute>类来引用。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>
<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A>方法执行设计时数据绑定。
## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。 第一个示例演示如何从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>控件派生控件, 并将其与数据绑定处理程序相关联。 第二个示例演示如何从<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>类派生类。
下面的代码示例`SimpleRadioButtonList`演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList>从控件派生控件<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute> , 然后应用属性以将`SimpleRadioButtonList`控件与其数据绑定处理程序 ( `SimpleRadioButtonListDataBindingHandler`类) 相关联。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonList.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlist.vb#5)]
下面的代码示例演示如何`SimpleRadioButtonListDataBindingHandler` <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>从类派生类。 它重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A>方法, 以便在控件被数据绑定`SimpleRadioButtonList`时将消息添加到关联的控件。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDataBindingHandler.cs#6)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdatabindinghandler.vb#6)]

Docs.related: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器
如何：在设计模式下扩展控件的外观和行为

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当<xref:System.Web.UI.DataBindingHandlerAttribute>特性引用类时, .NET Framework 在内部<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>构造类的新实例。

MemberSignature.Value: public override void DataBindControl (System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, System.Web.UI.Control control);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void DataBindControl(class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost designerHost, class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed
public: override void DataBindControl(System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesignerHost ^ designerHost, System::Web::UI::Control ^ control);

Docs.summary: 对指定的控件执行数据绑定。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataBindingsAccessor.DataBindings%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>如果由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl> `control`指定的控件在其属性中指定了数据源, 则该方法将清除的集合, 然后添加字符串消息指示是否已将数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>到集合。 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A>方法, 以便在控件被数据绑定时向关联`SimpleRadioButtonList`控件添加字符串消息。
此代码示例是为<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ListControlDataBindingHandler>类提供的更大示例的一部分。
[!code-csharp[ListControlDesigner_Samples#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/CS/SimpleRadioButtonListDataBindingHandler.cs#7)] [!code-vb[ListControlDesigner_Samples#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ListControlDesigner_Samples/VB/simpleradiobuttonlistdatabindinghandler.vb#7)]
